             <div class="content clearfix">
              <div>
               <!--<h1 style="text-align: center;">It's CAGGY AWARD VOTING TIME AGAIN!</h1>
 <div style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 12pt;"><a href="https://www.coloradoavidgolfer.com/vote-2017-caggy-awards-best-colorado-golf/" target="_blank">CLICK HERE</a> to cast your vote for CommonGround!!</span></div>-->
              </div>
              <div style="text-align: justify;">
               <span style="font-size: 18pt; background-color: #ffff00;">
                <span style="font-weight: bold; color: #333333; font-family: Garamond; font-size: large; text-align: center;">
                </span>
               </span>
              </div>
              <div>
               <div>
                <strong>
                 CommonGround
                </strong>
                is the home of the Colorado Golf Association, and is an affordable public facility built to support the mission of the CGA: "to represent, promote, and serve the best interests of golf in the state of Colorado."
               </div>
               <h3>
                <strong style="font-size: 2em; text-align: justify;">
                 <span style="color: #1f346a; font-size: 14pt;">
                  JOIN THE CGA NOW BY SIGNING UP FOR ONE OF OUR CLUBS:
                 </span>
                </strong>
                <div style="font-size: 2em; text-align: justify; display: inline !important;">
                </div>
               </h3>
               <div>
                <div>
                 <span style="font-size: 8pt;">
                  <em>
                   Members of the CGA receive 7 days advanced tee time reservations and a 25% discount on green fees when playing at CommonGround.
                   <br/>
                   <br/>
                  </em>
                 </span>
                </div>
               </div>
               <div>
                <span style="font-size: 10pt;">
                 <strong>
                  JOIN THE COMMONGROUND MEN'S CLUB:
                 </strong>
                 <a href="http://www.ghin.com/eclub/cga/Commonground_Mens_Golf_Club/" target="_blank">
                  CLICK HERE
                 </a>
                </span>
                <br/>
                <span style="font-size: 10pt;">
                 <em>
                  (Join this club if you would like to be eligible to participate in Men's Club Events)
                  <br/>
                  <br/>
                 </em>
                </span>
               </div>
               <div>
                <span style="font-size: 10pt;">
                </span>
               </div>
               <div>
                <span style="font-size: 10pt;">
                 <strong>
                  JOIN THE COMMONGROUND WOMEN'S GOLF CLUB:
                 </strong>
                 <a href="http://www.ghin.com/eClubhouse/eClubHome.aspx?cid=883" target="_blank">
                  CLICK HERE
                  <br/>
                  <br/>
                 </a>
                </span>
               </div>
               <div>
                <span style="font-size: 10pt;">
                </span>
               </div>
               <div>
                <span style="font-size: 10pt;">
                 <strong>
                  JOIN THE COMMONGROUND ONLINE CLUB (Men and Women):
                 </strong>
                 <a href="http://www.golfnations.com/cga/join-the-colorado-golf-association/join/?cid=2063" target="_blank">
                  CLICK HERE
                 </a>
                </span>
                <br/>
                <span style="font-size: 10pt;">
                 <em>
                  (Join this club if you only want your GHIN handicap and a CGA Membership - only $59.95 for 2018)
                 </em>
                </span>
               </div>
               <div>
               </div>
               <div>
                <h3>
                 What can the CGA do for you? Visit
                 <a href="http://www.coloradogolf.org" target="_blank">
                  www.coloradogolf.org
                 </a>
                 to find out!
                </h3>
               </div>
               <div>
               </div>
               <div>
                <h3>
                 <strong>
                  Why "CommonGround?"
                 </strong>
                </h3>
                <div>
                 The name "CommonGround" was chosen not simply to name a golf course, but to declare a mission:
                </div>
                <div>
                </div>
                <div>
                 "To provide everyone in the state with a first-class environment in which to comfortably learn, enjoy and support this amazing game and all that it offers."
                </div>
                <div>
                </div>
                <div>
                 Designed by world renowned golf course architect, Tom Doak, the facility includes a world-class 18-hole championship golf course, a short course devoted to Junior Golf development, a full-service practice facility and a caddie program.
                </div>
               </div>
               <div>
               </div>
               <div style="text-align: center;">
               </div>

                <strong>

                </strong>

                </h2>
